channel.title: Aretic 317 | Clan Chats | ClanWars | 30+
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i60.tinypic.com/qpf4oo.jpg[/img] [BATTLEPRIME] [font=verdana][shadow=white,left][i]This is a new server (317), We have a decent development team, which are 100% good at coding JAVA and we have got good website developers, we are currently going to do many videos on youtube, and do many good updates to make the "Players" Proud, and also We always listen to the player, whatever the players want, we add it to the game and make em happy! Hope you lads enjoy this server, there's more media and videos coming soon! (If you don't have anything to say to the server, then please don't post in this topic).[/i][/shadow][/font] [B][COLOR="#FF0000"]NOTE : IF WEBSITE DOESNT LOAD, PLEASE "REFRESH" IT :)[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/300eekp.png[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/]Website[/URL] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/vhahb8.jpg[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/community/]Community Forums[/URL] [img]http://sg-forum.info/imgs/play.png[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/playnow/]Webclient[/URL] [img]http://sg-forum.info/imgs/play.png[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/downloads/]Desktop Client[/URL]
[i][b]Latest Updates :[/b][/i]
[16/11/2014]
Added Dfs Spec When you Kill a NPC and it doesn't have a drop it shows the Npc Number and that you have to report it. Switching was Horrible Fixed this. Added Clue scrolls. Changed Weapon Stances. Started Working on a New Donator zone. Fixed Combat Flaws. Some Teleports were Broken, I've fixed these. Pvming should be better now Fixed The Gambler. 562 Hotkeys Added. (FKeys) Added Dwarven rock cake it currently Lowers 1 Hitpoint. Should this be changed to 10 or 98 Automatic ? Barrows Brothers hit through Prayer. (dharok does) I've made Barrows More Profitable, When you Kill a Barrows Brother, there's an 1/25 Chance you'll get a Drop from the Brother itself! Buying from a Shop Goes Like its on Runescape Added Iban's Blast
[i][b]Features :[/b][/i]
[u]602 items 602 NPC's Castle wars Pest Control Barrows Fishing Trawler Fight pits Barbarian Assault Fully working Godwars Fully working Gambler Fully working Clan chat system Auto-Vote Auto-Donation Great Coded Combat System 8+ Bosses Fully working JAD with WAVES! Weapon binding system Amazing customized dicing area Amazing Duo slayer system! more features will be listed..[/u]
[i][b]Media :[/b][/i]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/02Fde3o.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/xaYIkJ9.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/Yva3jnI.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/x16mxEK.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6gIdBOy.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/aGEOSng.png[/img] PLUS NOMAD + BORK!
Minigames : [img]http://i.imgur.com/dtPEhg4.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/87MA8wH.png[/img]
Weapon Binder : [img]http://i.imgur.com/66gAQop.png[/img]
Fully working Gambler : [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fceg2A2.png[/img]
Many useful shops : [img]http://i.imgur.com/a1pH2Hb.png[/img]
CastleWars : [img]http://i.imgur.com/dggYxCH.png[/img]
BarbAssault Shop : [img]http://i.imgur.com/OBefphw.png[/img] [B][COLOR="#FF0000"]NOTE : IF WEBSITE DOESNT LOAD, PLEASE "REFRESH" IT :)[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/300eekp.png[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/]Website[/URL] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/vhahb8.jpg[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/community/]Community Forums[/URL] [img]http://sg-forum.info/imgs/play.png[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/playnow/]Webclient[/URL] [img]http://sg-forum.info/imgs/play.png[/img] [URL=http://aretic317.com/downloads/]Desktop Client[/URL]
MORE COMMING SOON! [/center]

item.description:
@Owner1Mike wrote:

[center]
[BATTLEPRIME]
[font=verdana][shadow=white,left]This is a new server (317), We have a decent development team, which are 100% good at coding JAVA and we have got good website developers, we are currently going to do many videos on youtube, and do many good updates to make the “Players” Proud, and also We always listen to the player, whatever the players want, we add it to the game and make em happy! Hope you lads enjoy this server, there’s more media and videos coming soon! (If you don’t have anything to say to the server, then please don’t post in this topic).[/shadow][/font]

Latest Updates :

[16/11/2014]

Added Dfs Spec
When you Kill a NPC and it doesn’t have a drop it shows the Npc Number and that you have to report it.
Switching was Horrible Fixed this.
Added Clue scrolls.
Changed Weapon Stances.
Started Working on a New Donator zone.
Fixed Combat Flaws.
Some Teleports were Broken, I’ve fixed these.
Pvming should be better now
Fixed The Gambler.
562 Hotkeys Added. (FKeys)
Added Dwarven rock cake it currently Lowers 1 Hitpoint. Should this be changed to 10 or 98 Automatic ?
Barrows Brothers hit through Prayer. (dharok does)
I’ve made Barrows More Profitable, When you Kill a Barrows Brother, there’s an 1/25 Chance you’ll get a Drop from the Brother itself!
Buying from a Shop Goes Like its on Runescape
Added Iban’s Blast

Features :

602 items
602 NPC’s
Castle wars
Pest Control
Barrows
Fishing Trawler
Fight pits
Barbarian Assault
Fully working Godwars
Fully working Gambler
Fully working Clan chat system
Auto-Vote
Auto-Donation
Great Coded Combat System
8+ Bosses
Fully working JAD with WAVES!
Weapon binding system
Amazing customized dicing area
Amazing Duo slayer system!
more features will be listed…
